title: MONOPOLY + MONOPOLY Madness
description: MONOPOLY Grow your empire anywhere, anytime, with MONOPOLY for Stadia™! Choose among three lively 3D boards and play on-the-go with up to six players! Not enough time for a full game? Enjoy new modes for faster sessions. Trading your way to success has never been so fun! MONOPOLY Madness Rediscover the MONOPOLY game you love in a way you’ve never seen before. With shorter rounds, race other players across the chaotic streets of Monopoly City, collect resources, buy and upgrade properties, mess with your opponents, and avoid their tricks to win the race for riches. This is Madness!
notes: The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the game board, the four corner squares, the MR.
